alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Gwinnett; Newton; Rockdale; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 3:48PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Rockdale, southeastern DeKalb, south central Gwinnett, west central Walton and north central Newton Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 348 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Arabia Mountain, or near Conyers, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Conyers, Covington, Loganville, Oxford, Lithonia, Walnut Grove, Lakeview Estates, Georgia International Horse Park, Almon, Milstead, Belmont, Arabia Mountain, Big Haynes Creek Park, Redan, Rosebud, Gum Creek, and Panola Mountain State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
